summary: THE BRAKE PEDAL WAS SOMETIMES SOFT AND TRAVELED TO THE FLOOR, THE DEALER STATED A DUAL SWITCH NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *JB  THE ABS LIGHT WAS INTERMITTENT.
